title: Barbecued prawn skewers
ingredients: ['75ml lime juice', '5 tablespoons honey', '1 teaspoon soy sauce', '1 teaspoon vegetable oil', '2 tablespoons Jamaican jerk seasoning', '3 dashes hot pepper sauce', 'salt and pepper to taste', '900g raw king prawns, peeled and deveined', '12 wooden skewers']
